name: pMMF
tagline: A high performance, open source, parallel MMF library written in C++.
body:
Authors: Risi Kondor, Nedelina Teneva and Pramod K. Mudrakarta. Documentation: [soon]
Experimental performance: [[gallery]](http://people.cs.uchicago.edu/~risi/MMF/gallery.html)
BibTeX entry: [soon]
Web site: [[pMMF]](http://people.cs.uchicago.edu/~risi/MMF/index.html)
Requires:
    C++11 compatible compiler
    Eigen (only for matrix inversion and some tests)
    Matio (for Matlab format input/output)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
